Class Mycoplasma

java.lang.Object
Cell
Mycoplasma
public class Mycoplasma extends Cell
Simplest form of life. Fun Fact: Mycoplasma are one of the simplest forms of life. A type of bacteria, they only have 500-1000 genes! For comparison, fruit flies have about 14,000 genes.
